interface.description: Interface handling geospatial location of the device.

field.name: Location, Latitude
field.description: Latitude of the device, in degrees, using WGS-84 as a reference datum. Unit must be `°`.

field.name: Location, Longitude
field.description: Longitude of the device, in degrees, using WGS-84 as a reference datum. Unit must be `°`.

parameter.name: Location, Latitude
parameter.description: If parameter is published, it allows callers to set the latitude of the device. Unit of the value must be in degrees.

parameter.name: Location, Longitude
parameter.description: If parameter is published, it allows callers to set the longitude of the device. Unit of the value must be in degrees.

parameter.name: Location, Altitude
parameter.description: If parameter is published, it allows callers to set the altitude of the device. Unit of the value must be the same as for the `Location, Altitude` field.
